title: Should Influencers Choose Equity or Cash???
description: In episode 4, Reed and Blake discuss creators accepting equity in companies, opposed to the usual brand deal. The untapped potential for both creators, investors, and seed stage companies.
dc:creator: Reed Duchscher and Blake Robbins
itunes:summary: In episode 4, Reed and Blake discuss creators accepting equity in companies, opposed to the usual brand deal. The untapped potential for both creators, investors, and seed stage companies.
